And also at times it has a long processing time in between pictures, and even more when switching from pictures to videos.If you want a perfect camera go for the $700.00 Canon Rebel ( A real camera) Or if you want something, easy and useful then get this one. I am actually passing mine down to my parents soon.I would absolutely buy this camera again...

Reviews.Title: avoid
Reviews.Author: Moe
Reviews.Content: This camera take terrible low-light pictures, terrible macro-pictures, terrible back-lit pictures. A terrible camera -- period. Avoid.

Reviews.Title: Expected more
Reviews.Author: S. Watson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my bulkier Zsomethin Kodak Easyshare. It was  $170 when I bought it. I will be short with this review. The camera feels cheap, which doesnt really matter to me, but when my friends use it they comment on it. I hyped this camera up so much before I bought and now I feel like a fool. I took it with me out on a trip up north at the end of summer. It takes really bad low light photos like moon shots, bonfires, even on the proper settings. I feel like my close ups dont come out unless I use flash and then it is too bright. Some days the pictures are good, the next day I am swearin at the cam. I tried to return it to Walmart, where I bought it and they wouldn't take it back because I didn't have the original, non rechargeable batteries. Who really keeps the original pair of dead batteries? I would have given it more stars because it is very compact and It fits nicely in my purse. It takes great day time photos and has captured some spectacular sunsets, but then again, so does every other compact camera...

Reviews.Title: Excellent Pocket Kodak
Reviews.Author: Vicki E. Bessent
Reviews.Content: Bought this for Grand Daughter for her birthday. It is an above average pocket camera. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Poor Customer Service
Reviews.Author: K. Robinson
Reviews.Content: If you do buy this camera, BE EXTREMELY CAREFUL WITH IT! I dropped mine about 2.5 feet on carpet and the lens still got stuck! Kodak's customer service is HOPELESS. They think everything can be solved by just replacing the batteries, and the cost for repair might as well go towards a new camera. I would not recommend this camera because even though this camera is decent, there are much better ones out there.

Reviews.Title: not very pleased...
Reviews.Author: Musical Mom
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera a few months ago, not from Amazon, but from Walmart.  Had to let everyone know that the negative reviews are true.  I thought others had gotten a dud, but my pictures are blurry and grainy and I've tried all settings.  Also, it eats batteries--I changed them twice a day on a recent vacation.  Had a Canon before this and will go back in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: shutters stopped opening
Reviews.Author: Jason W. Pascoe "Rock Lee's Kicks"
Reviews.Content: I have always taken care of my camera.  I had it for almost a year.  And then the  shutters stopped opening.  I had to force them open and closed.  Also due note that kodak cameras are not compatable with movie maker or windows media player on Windows and is also difficult to to put your videos on youtube.  I actually stopped putting vids on youtube after I got my new camera.  Because it was so annoying.  I bought it because I could zoom in in video mode.  I found out that expensive cameras are not the best cameras.  I hope this helps out somebody.

Reviews.Title: Had to return for repair 4 times and never fixed it.
Reviews.Author: Micah Robinson "what?"
Reviews.Content: Kodak EasyShare Z1285 12.0MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical ZoomI bought this camera (kodak easyshare z1285)  spending a little extra than I wanted to thinking I was getting a good name brand. however, my experince was terrible with this camera as far as the reliablility. the featers were decent I suppose but the camera shutter froze up shortly after I bought it (brand new at walmart)  I kept very good care of the camera and it had only been less than a month. so i naturly went through the whole process of returning it..waiting to weeks to get it back.. I did this three times and every time I got it back there was something else wrong with the camera. the second time it was the review button would not work at all. I took the batter out and restarted..called customer service..ect. ended up sending the camera back..again and again until my warrentee ran out and not Im stuck with a camera that has the zoom stuck all the way out and will not even turn on.

Reviews.Title: Pick a different camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald Albury
Reviews.Content: We bought this so my wife could have a simple camera to take pictures of the grandkids and for eBay.  It was great for that - at least while it worked.  After 4 months the camera froze.  Kodak was useless - if you can't fix it by swapping batteries they don't know what to do.Save your money - buy a different camera.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: K. Scott
Reviews.Content: I have always had Kodak's because I like their quick response when taking a picture. The last Kodak that I had, the M853, was of poor quality with the LCD breaking just being in my bag and the lens breaking after only 1 year. So I was hesitant to purchase another Kodak without testing out the stability of the LCD screen. But, so far, so good with this camara. It's the Kodak quality that I have enjoyed over the years.

Reviews.Title: Really, really, really disappointed in the Kodak EasyShare Camera
Reviews.Author: Paulette Mcfadden
Reviews.Content: I did not purchase this camera from Amazon, but I really want to make sure people see this!  I purchased this camera in November.  It worked great over Christmas, but in march it stopped working.  It would turn on briefly then shut down immediately.  I sent the camera to the authorized repair place and they sent me a new camera.  The new camera had the same exact problem.  It worked for about 200 pictures then quit.  I returned it to the repair place.  They repaired the camera and sent it back.  Quess what!  It powered up just long enough to put in the date and time, then shut down.  I put in new batteries, it powered up and then immediately shut down.  So, I called Kodak.  Apparently, they are such a large company that they just don't care that their products are faulty.  I was told to try buying rechargable batteries (which is an investment that I would not consider since I use the camera maybe once every three months) because the Duracell and Energizer batteries are not strong enough to power the camera.  Strange that they worked before.  I asked if I could just get my money back so that I could purchase another camera.  NO!  Kodak does not offer refunds.  In short, DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY, TIME, AND EFFORT ON THIS CAMERA.  I wish I had checked the reviews online prior to my purchase, it may have saved me a huge headache since my problems do not seem to be unusual.

Reviews.Title: OK, but 2 problems...
Reviews.Author: KCHomer
Reviews.Content: The 2 main problems I have with this camera are 1, the batteries stink and 2, the viewing screen is great but, in making it so large, you lose the viewfinder and in doing so, you are out of luck when trying to view the screen in bright sunlight. You can't see it at all. But that doesn't matter because your batteries run out as soon as you put them in.  Other than that, it does have nice features, but the way up close, trying to zoom in and focus problems that other reviewers have noted are true.

Reviews.Title: Nice Stills, Intuitive UI, HD movies very nice under optimal conditions
Reviews.Author: P. Wieselquist "Peter Wieselquist"
Reviews.Content: Look, this is a family snapshot camera, so my rating is based on one thing only - what I call the "dummy mode keeper ratio" or DMKR. In other words, after shooting a typical family event on auto mode, it's a good cam if I'm not deleting lots of shots for bad quality (over-flashed, grainy, blurry). I don't care about software or docks, Picasa works for me for retouching.I've owned several cameras over the years, mostly Lumix and Kodak. So far this one seems to have a good DMKR, so it looks like a keeper, but I need to do more test shots.  As a parent chasing active kids trying to capture some spontaneous moments...there's usually no time to use "scenes" or mess with the manual settings. If this doesn't sound like you, disregard my opinion altogether.The UI is nice. Buttons well-placed and the 4-way joystick is implemented intuitively with the menu structure. I didn't find myself hunting around for the right setting. Low-light shots on this cam I thought were pretty decent for this class of camera. 5x zoom is good for this size cam. Any higher wouldn't work in this size body, so there goes your portability advantage.Now the video: My expectatons for this cam were simple. Can I leave the HD camcorder at home on outdoor family outings? The short answer is yes, but be careful. Here's what I've discovered:1. You can zoom in *before* you start shooting, just hold the camera very steady (or tripod it) and avoid panning around while zoomed in or the clip's going to be  very jumpy.2. Do not zoom in while shooting, the lens won't focus fast enough and you'll ruin the clip.3. Stick with outdoor use. As you might guess, indoor low-light clips will look grainy and noisy.Summary: For the price, I'd say it's a good do-it-all snapshot camera for the money. And it your video expectations are not too high, this can even double as your camcorder.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: W. James Chesser
Reviews.Content: My new Kodak EasyShare Z1285 camera is amazing.  It has 12 MP and a 5X zoom and is small enough to fit in your pocket.  The price was less than my older 4 MP, 3X bulky camera.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare Z1285 12.1MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. Art Crosby Jr.
Reviews.Content: Had a hard time getting the camera to turn on --- took about 10 trys to get it on. Took some great pictures. Truned it off. came back later to take more pictures and finally got the camera on again after 10 or 15 attemps. It kept getting worse untill it will not turn on at all.

Reviews.Title: click
Reviews.Author: Z-Stone
Reviews.Content: 12 mp which can be adjusted from a lower MP such as 6 & up.  Takes great pictures,the memory card that i bought was 8gigs great buy. I am very pleased with the results. I only by the best for the price and this was it.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: D. Lamb
Reviews.Content: I had this camera befor. I droped it on cement and it quit working .I was not happy.I looked for 6 months and when I got this one in the mail. I RELIZED THAT IT WAS THE SAME ONE THAT I HAD!It was just a diffrent color.Wow! I do like this camera.NICE crisp 8x10 photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: B. Walker "Diamond in the Rough"
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, great photos, I ended up taking my canon back and I purchased this one in it's place, i don't have a regret yet. Excellent photos and video. You can't go wrong, it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easy share
Reviews.Author: B. Sandmire
Reviews.Content: Kodak EasyShare Z1285 12.0MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical ZoomProduct was received defective.  The camera wouldn't stay turned on despite having new batteries.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera
Reviews.Author: CPS3C.com
Reviews.Content: Never mind that the 2 AA Battery's only last for about 20 pictures. I say never mind that because once your done with them in the camera they are still at 90% and will last for a long time in your tv remote or computer mouse or whatever you have that runs on AA's. I would recommend the rechargeable battery's but just remember that those used AA's from your photo shoot are still perfectly charged ( just not enough for this killer camera! It takes awesome pics and great video. HD video! This is a must buy. TRIPOD IS A MUST we are talking about HIGH DEFINITION IMAGES AND VIDEO SO STABILIZATION IS A MUST AT ALL TIMES! Remember the sun is your best tool when shooting :) I hope this helps people to make better decisions.

Reviews.Title: Awesome bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: William Schaefer "Billytech"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to upgrade from the one I already had.Wow am I glad I did! EXCELLENT high resolution and very easy to use.The battery life is non-existent if you use regular or alkaline batteries.Buying seperate 2500 MAH Nickel Metal Hydride batteries solved the battery life problem completely, for $5.00 mind you on EBay.Virtually NO complaints with this camera in the two months I've owned it.

Reviews.Title: Not Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Tinkerbell "Judy A"
Reviews.Content: I just bought the camera about a momth ago and I am not satisfied with it. First the picture on the screen isn't clear and the pictures are not a good quality when they are printed out.I thought with 12 megapixels it would be a lot clearer.

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed
Reviews.Author: A.Wilbourn
Reviews.Content: Kodak EasyShare Z1285 12.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical ZoomWhile it would seem like a great deal for a 12 MP camera, the quality of the images are not great at all. I have a DSLR that is a 6 MP and get far more detail there. The file size of the images at 12 MP are half the size of my DSLR. I wanted something for my wife to be able to throw in her purse, but was not pleased at all with the quality. Lots of noise in the images. As well the video does not have image stabilization so if you shoot a video holding it, you get sick trying to watch it afterwards.Very disappointed, return to the store (did not buy from Amazon) and now trying out a Sony, looks good so far and it is only a 7 MP camera.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Z1285 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert F. Duran "Lafayettecats"
Reviews.Content: Have a Kodak Printer so this was a logical choice. Very easy to use, great pictures, and I like the feel of the camera in my hands. If asked, would reccommend this camera as a a very fine product. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Average Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Denman "Miwade"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera with high expectations on the 12MP.  The quality of the pictures is not much better than the 7.1 MP I was using.  The camera also seems to eat batteries.  Picture quality at night is less than impressive.  I will keep using it and maybe this is as good as it gets, I don't know.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: ilikecheese
Reviews.Content: This camera is AMAZING!! It takes amazing pictures and video, and the battery life isn't too bad. All of the different features are spectacular!! This camera is worth every penny!!!

Reviews.Title: It works nice!
Reviews.Author: Cornelio Florian Mateo
Reviews.Content: I found a couple a reviews that made me cautious of buying my new camera Z1285. But I made my decision and it was a good one, my camera works just nice. I have made videos, taken pictures. Most I was worried about was how well it would perform in low light conditions, took a couple of pictures and they were OK for me so at this point I recommend that any body that want a good quality camera for a good price to buy Z1285. The 5x optic sum is superb. Go for yours, you won't regret!I did regret it latter, a couple of moth later it stopped working. I would give a red striped screen and never focus.  Not fix available locally.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Brandon D. Rauscher "brauscher"
Reviews.Content: Very good camera. HD videos come out nice. Pictures and videos take up a lot of space but they quality is very good.

Reviews.Title: Good camera- bad seller
Reviews.Author: Linda HutchinsonJim Hutchinson
Reviews.Content: The only good thing about this purchase was getting my payment credited back to my account by the seller. After claiming difficulty with my mailing address, seller was apparently content to use my money for a month and then return it. My advice: don't do business with DealCrisis for your electronics needs- or anything else for that matter. For their part, Amazon.com was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: I REPLACED THIS CAMERA WITH A KODAK Z1485 CAMERA FOR REASONS
Reviews.Author: Edward Murdoch "Renaissance Man"
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS BETTER IN MANY WAYS BUT NOT NEARLY IN ALL WAYS THAN COMPETING CAMERAS COSTING MUCH MORE MONEY.  I WAS HAPPY ENOUGH WITH IT TO REPLACE IT WITH AN IMPROVED VERSION OF IT, THE KODAK EASYSHARE Z1485 CAMERA, BUT I BELIEVE THAT THAT THE Z1485 IS BETTER THAN THIS THIS CAMERA IN QUITE A FEW WAYS OTHER THAN THE INCREASE IN TOTAL AVAILABLE PICTURE ELEMENTS (PIXELS).  THE KODAK Z1275 CAMERA IS ESSENTIALLY IDENTICAL TO THE Z1285 FROM ANYTHING THAT I CAN SEE OTHER THAN ITS COLOR.Kodak EasyShare Z1485 14MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.5 inch LCD (Black) Kodak EasyShare Z1485 14MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.5 inch LCD (Blue) Kodak EasyShare Z1485 14MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.5 inch LCD (Pink)

Reviews.Title: EasyShare Z1285
Reviews.Author: A. Horkman
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  Amazon provided excellent service and I will definately purchase from them again.Thank you,A. Horkman

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: J. Joplin
Reviews.Content: The camera was delivered right on time, and it works perfectly! No problem with this item or seller.

Reviews.Title: Great performance from an inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: Miguel A. Atuesta "Mig-21"
Reviews.Content: As stated before, the advantages of this camera are hard to find in this price range. 12 Mp, HD stills and video, decent zoom for stills/video and image stabilization, in a pocket size camera... well, I am happy with the purchase and would recommend it no problem!

Reviews.Title: kodak share digital camera
Reviews.Author: Becki Hutchison
Reviews.Content: this is my 3rd digital camera & this is the easiest,clearest picture producing camera i've had. i had a sony & cannon prior to this. it's great! the Z1285 is the simplist camera to use w/the best results.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: J. Singh
Reviews.Content: I thought this camera was great to begin with. It was 12mp camera that fit my budget ([...] after rebate at Office Depot) with 5x optical zoom. HD video recording at 720i with zoom capabilities was an extra plus. I bought a 4gb SDHC card because the guy at the store recommended it for this camera. On the down side this camera uses to much battery my AA only lasted about 12 pictures. Rechargeable batteries seem to work best. Another one would be that it has digital stabilization.I have ordered the CRV3 battery (other option is KAA2HR) hopefully that will last much longer than my AA's did or else its back to the store for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Content: I thought this camera was great to begin with. It was 12mp camera that fit my budget (160 after rebate at Office Depot) with 5x optical zoom. HD video recording at 720i with zoom capabilities was an extra plus. I bought a 4gb SDHC card because the guy at the store recommended it for this camera. On the down side this camera uses to much battery my AA only lasted about 12 pictures. Rechargeable batteries seem to work best. Another one would be that it has digital stabilization.I have ordered the CRV3 battery (other option is KAA2HR) hopefully that will last much longer than my AA's did or else its back to the store for this camera.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: C. Gray
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly.  Takes great pictures and the software is great for editing.  The only complaint it is has been freezing up occasionally.

Reviews.Title: Black and Decker 8" battery operated chain saw
Reviews.Author: Dennis A. Buckmeir
Reviews.Content: Great product although the charge doesn't last as long as the site claims.  I recommend getting the extra battery.  I did and I was able to cut about 24 3 inch limbs off white pines using both batteries.  Amazon's free shipping arived quickly and I am pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied
Reviews.Author: M. Granillo "sweet_lil_mo"
Reviews.Content: I received this a gift for a "throw in my purse" camera and for the video option.  The video was shaky, the images grainy and I am not at all pleased that the videos are in MOV format.  I don't want to purchase or download another program just to be able to edit my movies, I have Window Vista, not an Apple.  The software that came with it didn't provide the video support.  Back to the store it goes!- - this was not purchased through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: ok, where's the 1080i?
Reviews.Author: Richard Campbell "RichSC"
Reviews.Content: OK, so admitedly I just got this today. All the other features are great, but no where does it mention on the menus the ability to capture 1080i. 720P yes, but not 1080i, which is listed on the Kodak website feature sheet. Now, if you read it carefully, it says 'playback' in 1080i. Not sure how that occurs if you don't capture in 1080i, so maybe you want to double check on this one.I probably won't send it back, but really curious if this is a software upgrade or what?

Reviews.Title: I dont know
Reviews.Author: Yerika Pacheco
Reviews.Content: Good afternoon, to date I have not received the product, I know you're at the custome for nationalization. When the camera and enjoy it, I shall send you my opinion.

5x Schneider-Kreuznach Variogon optical image-stabilized zoom lens; HD still capture and HD video
2.5-inch indoor/outdoor color LCD; advanced settings include program and full manual mode (P/M)
Digital image stabilization reduces blur;  High ISO (up to 3200) capture details in low-light conditions and fast-action situations
Compatible with SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
